text: A butcher is person whose job is to prepare and sell meat. Some butchers also kill the animals the meat is from. Butchers also prepare sausages, and other meat-products. == Notable Butchers and Butcher Shops == Dario Cecchini Dennyâ€™s Giuseppe Campano Lobel's of New York Tom Mylan Omaha Steaks Arthur Orton Pat LaFrieda Meat Purveyors Salt Bae Category:Food-related occupations
title: Butcher
